com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.rate

Class RisiModulatorySynapseCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amd.aparapi.Kernel
      • com.ojcoleman.bain.base.ComponentCollection
        • com.ojcoleman.bain.base.ConfigurableComponentCollection<C>
          • com.ojcoleman.bain.base.SynapseCollection<C>
            • com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.rate.Niv2002SynapseCollection<RisiModulatorySynapseConfiguration>
              • com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.rate.RisiModulatorySynapseCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentConfigurationListener, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RisiModulatorySynapseCollection
extends Niv2002SynapseCollection<RisiModulatorySynapseConfiguration>
    Implements the plastic synapse model described by S. Risi, K.O. Stanley (2012) A Unified Approach to Evolving Plasticity and Neural Geometry. This model must be used in combination with RisiModulatoryNeuronCollection
    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Initialise the collection. This method should be called from a sub-classes constructor. Sub-classes should override this method to generate pre-calculated values used during the simulation, and call this super-method. Arrays/buffers initialised here and used in the run() method/kernel should be transferred to the execution hardware using put().
        Overrides:
        init in class Niv2002SynapseCollection<RisiModulatorySynapseConfiguration>

      • step

        public void step()
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Update the model over one time step. Sub-classes should call this super method. The step() method will invoke the overridden run() method which defines the Aparapi kernel. This method sets ComponentCollection.stateVariablesStale and ComponentCollection.outputsStale to true.
        Overrides:
        step in class SynapseCollection<RisiModulatorySynapseConfiguration>

      • run

        public void run()
        Description copied from class: SynapseCollection
        Implements the basic infrastructure for processing a synapse by updating the values of ComponentCollection.outputs and SynapseCollection.neuronInputs. Sub-classes may override this method, and if they modify the SynapseCollection.efficacy they must call the super-method after modifying it.
        Overrides:
        run in class Niv2002SynapseCollection<RisiModulatorySynapseConfiguration>

      • getConfigSingleton

        public ComponentConfiguration getConfigSingleton()
        Description copied from class: ConfigurableComponentCollection
        Get a reference to the sub-class specific ComponentConfiguration object for this ConfigurableComponentCollection.
        Overrides:
        getConfigSingleton in class Niv2002SynapseCollection<RisiModulatorySynapseConfiguration>

      • createCollection

        public ComponentCollection createCollection(int size)
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Create a new collection of this type of the given size. Implementations of this method should call ComponentCollection.init().
        Overrides:
        createCollection in class Niv2002SynapseCollection<RisiModulatorySynapseConfiguration>
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the new collection.
